price: 16. (Shaydaan) wuxuu yidhi: Sidaad u sababtay inaan lumo darteed, Waxaan aniguna u fadhiisan (aadmiga) Jidkaaga Toosan (ee Islaamka).
arabic: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأَقۡعُدَنَّ لَهُمۡ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla fabimā aghwaytanī la-aqʿudanna lahum ṣirāṭaka al-mus'taqīma
